content: I don’t think that the lack of Kiffin had as much in this as many want to say. I would venture to say that were he there, the playcalls would have gone the same way. I do think that the rest of the points do stand. It feels like more play action should have been called, and when Howard was being left alone, I think they should have made him their feature. We are not talking about this, however, if Scarbrough plays the entire game.
